1.title: Bracelets from Russia
1.plot: Gay roommates struggle to get past the recent murder of one of their boyfriends. He was killed for wearing a rainbow bracelet, which symbolizes support for gays. The gay roommates can't turn to the police because the police are in on it.

2.title: Letters from Russia
2.plot: The gayng (gay-gang) worry about a letter they've received from the Rot Police Department. Shocking things happen on this episode.

3.title: Lies from Russia
3.plot:
Know what this is about?

4.title: Brutality from Russia
4.plot: Turmoil and sorrow surround the gayng (gay-gang) after the death of a friend. It's a living nightmare.

imdb.plot outline: Times for the gay community in Russia have gone from bad to worse. Times became more tumultuous and brutal for 7 LGBT friends living together when President Vladimir Putin signed a new measure into law that outlaws being gay in public or more specifically; Outlaws homosexual propaganda among minors. Scenes From Russia is a dramatic miniseries that premiered on Monday, September 2, 2013. The once a week miniseries tells the story of 7 fictional LGBT characters who all reside in the small fictitious town of Rot, located in Russia.
